statements: DELETE FROM Resources WHERE resource_id = 100 AND status = 'inactive';
DELETE FROM PrintingJobs WHERE job_id = 1 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM Resources WHERE resource_id = 101 OR availability = false;
